examples: Why are you in such a big hurry ?
There is no hurry on that paperwork.

definitions.definition: an incidence of a defensive player forcing the quarterback to act faster than the quarterback was prepared to, resulting in a failed offensive play.
A tremolando passage for violins , etc., accompanying an exciting situation.

secondary_definitions: ( American football ) an incidence of a defensive player forcing the quarterback to act faster than the quarterback was prepared to, resulting in a failed offensive play.
( music ) A tremolando passage for violins , etc., accompanying an exciting situation.
